# Demonstration

This vignette demonstrates how to use the `LECCDSExPkg` to calculate the Hamming distance (Hamming, 1950) for all pairwise combinations of columns in a matrix containing continuous data.

```{r bin_mat}
mat <- LECCDSExPkg::test_mat

binned_mat <- LECCDSExPkg::bin_mat(X = mat, breaks = LECCDSExPkg::break_options[["50_inc"]])
```

```{r hamming_dist}
hd_mat <- LECCDSExPkg::hamming_distance(X = mat)
```
